Pre-Game Insights: The Heat are 10-6 in home games. Miami ranks ninth in the Eastern Conference with 15.0 fast break points per game led by Tyler Herro averaging 3.3.The Jazz are 5-13 on the road. Utah ranks sixth in the Western Conference with 11.9 offensive rebounds per game led by Walker Kessler averaging 3.9.
Others: The Heat average 111.4 points per game, 8.4 fewer points than the 119.8 the Jazz allow. The Jazz are shooting 45.8% from the field, 0.5% lower than the 46.3% the Heat's opponents have shot this season.
